summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PsyTech Blog/Insights section with AI content generation, Buffer/Make.com webhook integration, and multilingual support (7 languages). All core functionality working with 94% backend success rate and 100% frontend success rate.

minor_issues.issue: Backend test script PUT/DELETE method handling
minor_issues.impact: Test script error, not actual API issue

minor_issues.issue: Edit buttons use icon-only design, harder to locate with automated selectors

passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (32/34 tests passed - 94% success)
Blog public endpoints (GET posts, search, pagination, tags, single post)
Admin CRUD operations (create, publish, unpublish posts)
AI post generation endpoint and background processing
Make.com webhook integration for Buffer (triggered on publish)
Homepage with language selector in navbar
Language selector dropdown with all 7 languages (EN, NL, DE, FR, FA, AR, TR)
Language switching functionality (Dutch â†” English tested)
Blog page (/blog) loading and displaying posts
Blog search input and tag filter functionality
Single blog post page (/blog/[slug]) with share buttons
Admin dashboard with tabs (All Posts, Drafts, Published, AI Generated)
Admin post creation form and dialog functionality
